scripts.postinstall: git remote add utils git@github.com:codeparkhouston/hs-utils.git; git remote add lion git@github.com:codeparkhouston/code-lion.git; git remote add lessons git@github.com:codeparkhouston/hs-fall-2015.git; git fetch --all; git subtree add --prefix=hs-utils utils/gh-pages; git subtree add --prefix=code-lion lion/gh-pages; git subtree add --prefix=hs-fall-2015 lessons/gh-pages;
scripts.prestart: git pull -s subtree utils gh-pages; git pull -s subtree lion gh-pages; git pull -s subtree lessons gh-pages;
